title: Lotus Health AI Raises $41 Million to Build AI-Powered Model for Primary Care
description: Lotus Health AI raised $35 million in a Series A funding round to increase the availability of its “AI doctor” that provides free, round-the-clock primary care. Together with a seed round, this brought the company’s total funding to $41 million, Lotus Health AI said in a Tuesday (Feb. 3) press release. The company will use the new funding to build [...]The post Lotus Health AI Raises $41 Million to Build AI-Powered Model for Primary Care appeared first on PYMNTS.com.

title: Unicorn India Ventures closes third fund at Rs 1,200 crore, to invest in semicon, spacetech and AI infra
description: Unicorn India Ventures has closed its third fund at Rs 1,200 crore, surpassing its initial target of Rs 1,000 crore. The fund focuses on investments in semiconductors, spacetech and AI infrastructure. It has already seen strong early traction, with seven to eight portfolio companies witnessing substantial follow-on rounds, the firm said.

title: Data, AI and Strategy in focus at Dr Bala V Balachandran Memorial Lecture
description: The event brought together academic leaders, industry veterans, alumni and well-wishers to honour the life and ideas of a pioneer

title: Pa.’s approach to joining the AI race must put people first, Shapiro said in budget address
description: “I know Pennsylvanians have real concerns about these data centers and the impact they could have on our communities, our utility bills, and our environment. And so do I.”
